name: Deprogramming PsyOps Effects
description: Methods to reverse subconscious conditioning and cognitive programming imposed by PsyOps tactics.

cards.title: Breaking Conditioned Responses
cards.description: Counteracting conditioned thought patterns and automatic compliance behaviors.
cards.bulletpoints: Use exposure reversal, neural repatterning, and cognitive autonomy reinforcement

cards.title: Neutralizing Emotional Anchors
cards.description: Eliminating emotional triggers and anchors placed by psychological manipulation tactics.
cards.bulletpoints: Implement emotional desensitization, anchor dissociation, and subconscious untethering techniques
